title: Pre-Service Teacher Classroom Practice Competency Development Program via Virtual Classroom Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and mathematics subject matter knowledge
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to design and operate math lessons in virtual environments, accumulating experiences similar to real classroom settings.

learning_goals: Learners can execute teaching strategies that elicit student arguments in math discussion classes with over 80% accuracy in a simulated environment.
Learners can perform at least three customized instructional response techniques based on student response types (active/passive/defiant) in a virtual classroom environment.
Learners can predict and prepare countermeasures for 90% of potential issues in actual lesson design based on simulation-based teaching practice experiences.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
